comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: A little more information about the demolition of the house after Wareham's death. Some of the features of the garden remain in the yard of a newer home, pictured: www.cincinnatimodern.com/blog/tag/midcentury-modern-archi... The extant part pictured at cincinnatimodern.com , www.cincinnatimodern.com/storage/thumbnails/5053318-11303...seems to be this tiled pond and stone wall, pictured in an untinted Frances Johnston lantern slide online at LOC: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/ppmsca.21898/ Here's another part of the garden: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/ppmsca.21827/

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog,

Excellent detective work! I especially enjoy the spotting of the tiled pond 'then and now'! Thanks for tracking this down as well as linking to what you found.
